CustomField.formula: IF(Loop__Email_Template__c ="", HYPERLINK("/apex/loop__selectemailtemplate?ddpId=" & Id, IMAGE("/img/icon/documents16.png", "Change") & " Select Email Template","_self"), HYPERLINK("/" & Loop__Email_Template__c & "/s?id=" & Loop__Email_Template__c & "&previewMode=1", IMAGE("/img/icon/mail16.png", "Preview") & " Preview","_blank") & " " & HYPERLINK("/apex/loop__selectemailtemplate?ddpId=" & Id, IMAGE("/img/icon/documents16.png", "Change") & " Change","_self")& " " & HYPERLINK("/apex/loop__selectemailtemplate?ddpId=" & Id & "&ic=None", " None","_self"))
CustomField.label: Default Email Template
